entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,10,1,1}{F87B,4,3,1,1}{F813,0,116001}No matter where we go, we are still{F801}within the Domain...{F801}{F802}{F87B,5,8,1,2}{F813,0,116002}I had high hopes of this place. I heard{F801}there would be books to be found here...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,116003}Eh? What were these "high hopes" in{F801}expectation of...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,11,1,1}{F813,0,116004}Oh... Ahh, you see... I had thought...{F801}I might be able to finish...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Black Samurai\0{F87A,12}{F87B,12,1,1,1}{F813,0,116008}As I knew we would.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,116009}Welcome to Tokyo... Samurai of the{F801}Eastern Kingdom of Mikado.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Black Samurai\0{F87A,12}{F87B,12,1,1,1}{F813,0,116008}As I knew we would.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,116009}Welcome to Tokyo... Samurai of the{F801}Eastern Kingdom of Mikado.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Black Samurai\0{F87A,12}{F87B,12,1,1,1}{F813,0,116010}You, girl... It's a shame you won't{F801}ever find out how your manga ends.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,4,8,1,1}{F87B,5,7,1,1}{F813,0,116012}Tralaalaa! I'm afraid I can't hear you!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,4,8,1,1}{F87B,5,7,1,1}{F813,0,116012}Tralaalaa! I'm afraid I can't hear you!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Black Samurai\0{F87A,12}{F87B,12,1,1,1}{F813,0,116014}So, how are you liking Tokyo? Are you{F801}used to things here yet?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,116015}Since, after all, Tokyo mirrors the{F801}Eastern Kingdom of Mikado.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Black Samurai\0{F87A,12}{F87B,12,1,1,1}{F813,0,116014}So, how are you liking Tokyo? Are you{F801}used to things here yet?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,116015}Since, after all, Tokyo mirrors the{F801}Eastern Kingdom of Mikado.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F813,0,116016}What an insult...! How dare you utter{F801}such nonsense!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,2,1,1}{F813,0,116016}What an insult...! How dare you utter{F801}such nonsense!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Black Samurai\0{F87A,12}{F87B,12,1,1,1}{F813,0,116017}You're slow to understand as ever.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,116018}What about you there?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Black Samurai\0{F87A,12}{F87B,12,1,1,1}{F813,0,116017}You're slow to understand as ever.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,116018}What about you there?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Black Samurai\0{F87A,12}{F87B,12,1,1,1}{F813,0,116019}If you were told that you must live{F801}here in Tokyo, do you think that you{F801}could...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Black Samurai\0{F87A,12}{F87B,12,1,1,1}{F813,0,116019}If you were told that you must live{F801}here in Tokyo, do you think that you{F801}could...?{F801}

entry.source: "I could manage it."{F801}"I could never."{F801}"I don't know."{F801}
entry.target: "I could manage it."{F801}"I could never."{F801}"I don't know."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Black Samurai\0{F87A,12}{F87B,12,1,1,1}{F813,0,116020}So, that's where you stand now...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Black Samurai\0{F87A,12}{F87B,12,1,1,1}{F813,0,116022}So you can't even form an opinion{F801}when asked a question... Pitiful.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Black Samurai\0{F87A,12}{F87B,12,1,1,1}{F813,0,116022}So you can't even form an opinion{F801}when asked a question... Pitiful.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,2,1,1}{F87B,4,12,1,2}{F813,0,116023}I think this is enough idle chatter.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,116024}You will surrender to us calmly and{F801}quietly this time!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}{F87B,5,2,1,1}{F87B,4,12,1,2}{F813,0,116023}I think this is enough idle chatter.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,116024}You will surrender to us calmly and{F801}quietly this time!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Black Samurai\0{F87A,12}{F87B,12,1,1,1}{F813,0,116025}Very well... do as you will.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Black Samurai\0{F87A,12}{F87B,12,1,1,1}{F813,0,116025}Very well... do as you will.{F801}
